## apigear x doc

exports cli docs as markdown

### Synopsis

export the cli docs as markdown document into a dir

```
apigear x doc [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force   make dir and overwrite existing files
  -h, --help    help for doc
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.apigear.yaml)
```
